attributes.action: allow non EU immigrants to earn their right to British citizenship and all its benefits through compulsory national or community service
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: If a person wishes to join our nation and benefit from all the priviledges that British citizenship provides they should be allowed to do so through 3 years compulsory national or community service in return for basic housing and food requirements.  This would address many problems including detering fake asylum seekers.  Additionally, these immigrants can be seen as having truly earned their place as a member of our nation and not simply here for a free ride.
